FuncDef:
The mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable command enables the function to collect traffic statistics about VPWS PWs.
The undo mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable command disables the function to collect traffic statistics about VPWS PWs.
By default, the function to collect traffic statistics about VPWS PWs is disabled.
CLIs: mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable [ secondary | bypass ]
undo mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable [ secondary | bypass ]

ParaDef.Info:
Enables the function to collect traffic statistics about the secondary VPWS PW.
-

Enables the function to collect traffic statistics about the bypass VPWS PW.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-GigabitEthernet2/0/0] mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable secondary
[*HUAWEI-GigabitEthernet3/0/0] mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable bypass
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view VPWS traffic statistics about a VPWS PW, run the mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable command. These statistics help you learn network operating status.
Prerequisites
The primary VPWS PW and secondary or bypass VPWS PW have been established.
Precautions
The function to collect VPWS PW traffic statistics can be used together with VPWS QoS functions. The VPWS-QoS-based traffic statistics collection function takes effect on an interface only after VPWS QoS is enabled on the interface.If you do not specify secondary or bypass when running the mpls l2vpn pw traffic-statistics enable command, the function to collect traffic statistics about the primary VPWS PW is enabled.
